definition: preparedness/to bring sth to a state of readiness
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Train servicing is the key job for the safety of the high-speed railway.
sentences.chinese: 列車整備是高速鐵路保障行車安全的重要工作。

sentences.english: All the dead and wounded were in the area around the centre.
sentences.chinese: 死者和傷者都分佈於士兵整備中心周圍。

sentences.english: Conditioning is an important step in whole management process.
sentences.chinese: 對其實施整備作業是有效管理的一個重要環節。

sentences.english: The development of simulation technology leads to improved quality of equipment.
sentences.chinese: 仿真技術的發展，導致整備的質量提高。

definition: disaster prevention/to protect against natural disasters
see 推進器|推进器[tui1 jin4 qi4]
to introduce into/to channel/to lead/to guide into/to import (data)
to tidy up/to mop up/a sweep (against crime)
